entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance optimization in StreamPipeReader makes IsCompleted false if data buffered but at the end of the Stream #87984
  • NativeRuntimeEventSource behaves inconsistently for LogAlways #87983
    8.0.0
  • DotnetRuntime provider needs to handle WCHAR strings #87978
    8.0.0
  • The regular expression does not return a greedy result. #87976
  • .NET framework 4.8.1 TLS 1.3 incompatible with .NET 6 TLS 1.3, presumably other versions #87975
  • learn: how to implement a client of the event based asynchronous pattern throws a platform not supported exception #87974
  • Make limsquic load failures actionable #87970
    8.0.0
  • Decoder ran into invalid data #87965
  • Frozen collection construction performance #87964
    8.0.0
  • _marshal_task_to_cs calls complete_task on already completed task #87963
  • ILC fails to initialize native object writer with path containing '../' #87961
  • `runtime-staging` pipeline running on PRs #87958
  • [HttpStress] massive cancellation errors in HTTP/3 #87957
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Composing and decomposing integers from/to smaller sizes #87954
  • LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests crashed in CI #87951

Closed

  • Extract interface IReadOnlyStream in System.IO.Stream #80368
  • [crossgen2] Lazy string optimization #48580
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Last-use copy elision does not handle IR created by physical promotion #87471
    8.0.0
  • Missing timezone version 6.0.18 #87973
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_72133/Runtime_72133/Runtime_72133.dll #87888
    8.0.0
  • Reliable No GC Region #37667
    8.0.0
  • Json source generator generates uncompilable code for new .NET Framework project #83392
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Matrix4x4.CreateViewport #79961
    8.0.0
  • Adding Request-Id header breaks distributed tracing on .NET Full Framework #87827
  • TLS handshake fails on HttpClient, but works on WebRequest #87571
  • NativeAOT type instantiation sharing #83318
    Future
  • [API Proposal] QuicError.AcceptConnectionFailed #75184
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Native.Android-static is braking JNI libs compiled with NativeAOT. #72556
    Future
  • [HttpStress] massive timeouts around HTTP/3 stress test startup #77126
    8.0.0
  • Minimizing size of Dotnet WebAssembly Browser app #87617
    8.0.0
  • Delete support for Marshal.GetTypeFromCLSID #72914
    Future
  • Ban SR.GetResourceString #81338
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2208423 #87991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Avoid prefer-ing gsharedvt versions of AsyncMethodBuilder… #87990
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Port FrozenDictionary's length bucket optimizations to FrozenSet #87989
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove optimizeForReading overloads from FrozenDictionary/Set #87988
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable scoped parameters in signatures of source-generated interop methods #87987
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix UnsafeAccessors with Relocs #87986
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot] Build host bits when targeting iOS platforms with Native AOT #87985
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • ZipArchive now disposes given stream only once #87982
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Document new STJ diagnostics and fix diagnostic id conflicts. #87980
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug changes #87979
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid leaking committed bytes for large pages #87977
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` locales covering `LocaleStringData`. #87972
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [HTTP/3] Fix handling cancelation during QUIC connection establishment #87971
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [System.Numerics] Cross Product for Vector2 and Vector4 #87968
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Stop setting class handles for promoted parameter SIMD fields #87967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Resolve path before initializing objwriter #87962
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add ConfigurationExtensions tests to NativeAOT exclusions #87955
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add AddHttpClientDefaults #87953
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [IGNORE][wasm] refactoring wbt a bit #87952
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Matrix4x4.CreateViewport #87748
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Insert writebacks more eagerly #87869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a size component to the physical promotion heuristic #87969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle GT_FTN_ADDR in gtClone #87942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TargetOS::IsMacOS was not properly handled on X64 #87940
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add unsupported language detection to the STJ source generator #87950
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (4/n) #87876
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Add span-based static Create overloads for immutable collections #87945
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (5/n) #87960
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Add timeouts to SendRecv_Stream_TCP_MultipleConcurrentReceives #87943
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2207912 #87948
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Fix constant preparing for shuffle stub #87708
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Delete CLSID cruft from reflection #87907
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove uses of SR.GetResourceString throughout the libs #87912
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Speed up KeyAnalyser #87590
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Complete interp PackedSimd support and expand jiterp support #87903
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion #87917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • JIT: don't set edge weights to zero for inconsistent profiles #87947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • RemoveDirectoryRecursive: fix delete of mount points #86918
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Allow unnecessary [In, Out] attributes on blittable arrays and report them as unnecessary #87774
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Auto generate Event Ids in the logging source gen #87892
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] ILStrip sorts custom attribute table #87933
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add IStartupHostedService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix `--make-repro-path` handling of "ILLinker compatible" parameters #87909
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Fix invalid datetimeoffset parsing #87801
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add support for including System.Index and System.Range downlevel within dotnet/runtime #87840
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement casing functions #87919
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Enable reading process environment variables in EventPipe #87771
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use config binding generator in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Configuration assembly #87935
    area-Extensions-Logging, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87770
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • throw SocketException for Quic transport errors #87208
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema and output layout #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Revert msquic hack in stress tests #87926
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenericPInvokeCalliHelper arg #87928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt+sdk #87345
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
